content: this adorable squid crochet pattern is inspired by the red colossal squid from the deep waters of the ocean picture it squishy tentacles big ol eyes and all the charm you could possibly want in a crochet creation yep that s axel the squid in a nutshell this crochet pattern squid makes a super fun eco-friendly and sustainable amigurumi sea animal toy bring axel to life in his beautiful 13-page pdf pattern i have also created a video tutorial to help you bring this easy pattern together quickly whether you re making him for your family or as a gift for someone else this sweet squid amigurumi will be treasured because it was handmade for them by you this crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available for download immediately after purchase it is full of detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures to help you along the way i am always available to help and answer questions as well see contact info below size using dk weight yarn and a 3 00mm crochet hook this crochet squid will end up being about 18 from the top of his mantle to the tip of his tentacle skill level ambitious beginner - the pattern uses basic stitches simple stitch patterns & techniques simple color work and shaping looking for more join me below __________ subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable guides & resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ facebook https //www facebook com/offthebeatenhook pinterest https //www pinterest com/offthebeatenhook youtube https //www youtube com/@offthebeatenhook2985 this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced resold distributed published altered translated posted or shared without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing
